long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wish you were able to click on the recommendations in your Inbox and read as many posts on famous blogging websites, without having to sign up or becoming a member?

Wish your clicks on Social media websites are not tracked and ads do not show up on your computer based on what you visited from the Social media websites?

Welcome to Frurl - Free URLs. The goal is to make your clicks "tracking-free".

It's simple:
1. Right-click on the URL you wish "Free"
2. "frurl it"
3. The URL would open up in an Incognito window and devoid of any tracking

FAQs:
1. Does frurl track our clicks? Well, NO!
2. What if it does not work for me for some of the URLs? This is highly possible given there are myriad ways to "Track" us on the web. Please send a note to the support email (frurlit@gmail.com) and we will take a look
